sentences.en: Her hair was cut short at the nape of her neck.
sentences.cn: 她脖子后面的头发剪得很短。

sentences.en: Her long fair hair was fastened at the nape of her neck by an elastic band.
sentences.cn: 她长长的金发用一根橡皮筋扎在了脖子后面。

sentences.en: Nape needle can obviously ameliorate blood supply of vertebra basilar artery.
sentences.cn: 项针能明显改善椎-基底动脉的血液供应。
